metadata.title: CVE-2024-7524 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description: Firefox adds web-compatibility shims in place of some tracking scriptsblocked by Enhanced Tracking Protection.  On a site protected by ContentSecurity Policy in "strict-dynamic" mode, an attacker able to inject anHTML element could have used a DOM Clobbering attack on some of the shimsand achieved XSS, bypassing the CSP strict-dynamic protection. Thisvulnerability affects Firefox < 129, Firefox ESR < 115.14, and Firefox ESR< 128.1.

criterions.comment: mozjs115: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
